data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Szadziewski, Ryszard, Dominiak, Patrycja (2015): Afrostilobezzia, a new genus of predatory biting midges from the Afrotropical Region (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae). Zootaxa 3941 (3): 445-450, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3941.3.11
